questionTitle: There is ________ that I may have to go into hospital next week.
Call for me at any time that ________ you.
He always wore a shirt with an open ________.
I have learned all the irregular verbs ________.
The soldiers were put in prison because they ________ to obey orders.
I don't believe he can ________ it properly.
I ________ as ill as I do now for a long time.
If he ________ lucky, he can get the job .
Does your new secretary ________ shorthand?
Mary and John ________ to the parties at the Student Union every Friday.
Mike had hoped ________ his letter.
They forgot about ________ them to join us for lunch.
I really appreciate ________ to help me, but I am sure that I will be able to manage by myself.
It's difficult to pay one's bills when prices keep ________.
We have no ________ in our files of your recent letter to the tax office.
They said they had the European rights for the product but it was a lie. They were acting under false ________.
The teacher says, "The time is up." This means that the period of time has ________.
________ we dislike him, he's efficient and we can't dismiss him.
The examiners often ________ extremely difficult questions for the literature exam.
All we see is the ________ of the iceberg; six  seventh of it are underwater.
